reporting-org.narrative: Coffey International Development Ltd, A Tetra Tech Company

description.narrative: The Livelihoods and Food Security Programme (LFSP) is a multi-year poverty reduction and economic growth programme supported by DFID (£70 million) and designed to improve the food security and nutrition of Zimbabwean farmers and consumers. Targeting smallholder men and women farmers in eight diverse agro-ecological districts of Northern and Eastern Zimbabwe, the LFSP will address constraints to productivity, market participation and the supply and demand of nutritious foods. The Monitoring, Reporting and Evaluation of the LFSP will deliver a robust monitoring, reporting and evaluation of the LFSP which will facilitate internal lesson learning to DFID throughout the programme’s lifetime and support external lesson learning by filling gaps in the evidence base on effective ways of supporting livelihoods and tackling food insecurity and malnutrition in Zimbabwe.

Targeting smallholder men and women farmers in eight diverse agro-ecological districts of Northern and Eastern Zimbabwe, the LFSP will address constraints to productivity, market participation and the supply and demand of nutritious foods. The Monitoring, Reporting and Evaluation of the LFSP will deliver a robust monitoring, reporting and evaluation of the LFSP which will facilitate internal lesson learning to DFID throughout the programme’s lifetime and support external lesson learning by filling gaps in the evidence base on effective ways of supporting livelihoods and tackling food insecurity and malnutrition in Zimbabwe.
